name: paymentAuthorizationViewController(_:didAuthorizePayment:completion:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user authorized the payment request, and asks for a result. DeprecatedUse paymentAuthorizationViewController(_:didAuthorizePayment:handler:) instead.
declaration:
optional func paymentAuthorizationViewController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, 
                             didAuthorizePayment payment: PKPayment, 
                                      completion: @escaping (PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus) -> Void)
